title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
Ecolab is looking for a
 **Sr** 
**Software Engineer** 
 to enhance, maintain and support business application platforms. The Sr Software Engineer will apply engineering and programming best practices to deliver and enhance software solutions that meet business needs. Designs, codes, tests, debugs and documents those solutions. Works directly with peers in digital technology organization as well as with business associates on projects and support. Self\\-motivated professional, able to function independently and within a team structure.
   

  

**What’s In It For You**
* The opportunity to take on some of the world’s most meaningful challenges, helping customers achieve clean water, safe food, and healthy environments
* The ability to make an impact and shape your career with a company that is passionate about growth
* The support of an organization that believes it is vital to include and engage diverse people, perspectives and ideas to achieve our best


**What You Will Do**
* Provide technical design/support/development for various business application platforms supporting Ecolab GBS business areas globally
* Ability to apply strong analytical skills even in areas currently not proficient or vaguely defined
* Provide analysis needed to resolve support issues, optimize system performance and ensure the availability, performance and application security of critical business platforms
* Provide operational support for various business applications
* Provide technical guidance to junior team members
* Collaborate with technology peers and third\\-party vendor support teams on support issues and solutions to meet business needs
* Participate in periodic maintenance activities, refreshes, patching, disaster recovery and upgrades
* Drive solutions to support issues to successful completion within the support SLA
* Responsible for the support and proactive monitoring of the business applications including installation, performance, break fixes and change requests per business requirements
* Create and maintain detailed business application documentation


**Minimum Qualifications**
* Bachelor's degree in a relevant discipline (Computer Science, Engineering or MIS) or equivalent work experience
* Minimum 5 years’ experience in Information Technology
* Minimum 3 years’ experience in software installation, upgrades, performance tuning, support and administration
* Experience with applications running on Windows/UNIX Operating System
* Experience with application and server monitoring tools (SCOM, Elastic, AppDynamics)
* Experience working with third\\-party support teams
* Able to act independently, seeking guidance and advice as appropriate


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience with SAP integrated business applications
* Experience with integration via sFTP, API, EDI, RFC
* Experience with SaaS solutions
* Experience developing jobs in scheduling software UC4/Automic Automation or similar scheduling tool
* Experience with ServiceNow
* Knowledge of security, database, hardware, networks and cloud \\& virtualization concepts


 A trusted partner at nearly three million commercial customer locations, Ecolab (ECL) is the global leader in water, hygiene and infection prevention solutions and services. With annual sales of $13 billion and more than 45,000 associates, Ecolab delivers comprehensive solutions, data\\-driven insights and personalized service to advance food safety, maintain clean and safe environments, optimize water and energy use, and improve operational efficiencies and sustainability for customers in the food, healthcare, hospitality and industrial markets in more than 170 countries around the world.
   

  

 When you come to work at Ecolab, you get to take on some of the world’s most meaningful challenges and have the opportunity to learn and grow, shape your career, make an impact and quickly see the importance of your work.
   

  

 For more Ecolab news and information, visit www.ecolab.com. Follow us on Twitter @ecolab, Facebook at facebook.com/ecolab, LinkedIn at Ecolab or Instagram at Ecolab Inc
   

  

**Our Commitment to a Culture of Inclusion \\& Belonging**
 Ecolab is committed to fair and equal treatment of associates and applicants and furthering the principles of Equal Opportunity to Employment. We will recruit, hire, promote, transfer and provide opportunities for advancement based on individual qualifications and job performance in all matters affecting employment, compensation, benefits, working conditions, and opportunities for advancement. Ecolab will not discriminate against any associate or applicant for employment because of race, religion, color, creed, national origin,citizenship status, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity and expressions, genetic information, marital status, age, or disability.

title: Senior Software Engineer - MuleSoft
description:
🚀 Hiring: Senior Software Engineer – MuleSoft
   

 📍 Location: Baner, Pune (Mandatory Work From Office)
   

 🕒 Shift: PST Coverage (Till 11:00 AM PST)
   

 🏢 Work Mode: 100% WFO \\| No Hybrid \\| No Exception
   

 ⚡ Joining: Immediate Joiners Only
   

 💼 Employment Type: Full\\-time
   

 🔎 About the Role
   

 We are hiring an experienced Senior Software Engineer – MuleSoft to design, build, and support scalable, secure, and high\\-performance enterprise integrations using the MuleSoft Anypoint Platform.
   

 This is a critical, high\\-priority role requiring strong hands\\-on expertise, ownership, and production support experience.
   

 🛠️ Key Responsibilities
   

 Design, develop, and maintain integrations and APIs using MuleSoft Anypoint Platform (Mule 4\\.x)
   

 Implement API\\-led connectivity aligned with enterprise architecture standards
   

 Build integrations connecting Salesforce, enterprise systems, APIs, and AI services
   

 Develop high\\-quality, maintainable code using DataWeave, Java, XML
   

 Implement and manage CI/CD pipelines, automated testing using MUnit, and deployments on CloudHub / Hybrid environments
   

 Provide production support, troubleshoot complex issues, and resolve defects promptly
   

 Create and maintain technical documentation (RAML / OAS, workflows, troubleshooting guides)
   

 Collaborate closely with business stakeholders and cross\\-functional teams
   

 ✅ Must\\-Have Qualifications
   

 Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science / Information Systems or related field
   

 5\\+ years of overall software engineering experience
   

 3–5\\+ years of hands\\-on experience with MuleSoft Anypoint Platform
   

 Strong experience with Java, REST, SOAP, JSON, XML
   

 Solid understanding of SDLC \\& Agile methodologies
   

 Strong debugging and troubleshooting skills using Mule runtime logs \\& flow analyzers
   

 Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills
   

 ⭐ Preferred Skills (Good to Have)
   

 Experience integrating AI/ML services with MuleSoft workflows
   

 Experience with AWS services alongside MuleSoft deployments
   

 MuleSoft Certification (Developer L1/L2 or Architect)
   

 Strong experience with Salesforce integrations and MuleSoft connectors
   

 📌 Important Note
   

 Mandatory WFO – Baner, Pune
   

 PST time overlap till 11:00 AM is compulsory
   

 Only immediate joiners or candidates who can join at the earliest should apply

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a Senior Backend Engineer with deep hands\\-on experience in

 **aggregation framework**

 **Node.js**

* Design, implement, and optimize complex MongoDB schemas and aggregation pipelines for analytical and transactional use cases.

* Collaborate with frontend, QA, and DevOps teams to define API contracts and optimize end\\-to\\-end delivery.

* Contribute to CI/CD pipelines, code reviews, and internal tools improving developer velocity.


**Required Skills**
* MongoDB (Expert Level): Aggregation framework, performance tuning, sharding, indexing strategies, schema design.
* Node.js (Advanced): Asynchronous design, modular architecture, worker queues, API scalability.
* GraphQL (Proficient): Schema design, resolvers, query optimization, and federation patterns.

title: Senior Backend Developer
description:
**Experience** 
 : 5\\.00 \\+ years
   

  

**Salary** 
 : Confidential (based on experience)
   

  

**Expected Notice Period** 
 : 15 Days
   

  

**Shift** 
 : (GMT\\+05:30\\) Asia/Kolkata (IST)
   

  

**Opportunity Type** 
 : Remote
   

  

**Placement Type** 
 : Full Time Permanent position(Payroll and Compliance to be managed by: A UK\\-based Finance Analytics Automation Platform)
   

  

**(\\*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' client \\- A UK\\-based Finance Analytics Automation Platform)
   

  

**What do you need for this opportunity?
   

  

**Must have skills required:**
 2\\+ years of Relational Database experience., 2\\+ years of Python experience., 5\\+ years of BE development experience.
   

  

**A UK\\-based Finance Analytics Automation Platform is Looking for:******
**Job Description**
**About:**
 The company is a smart finance automation platform. We help SMEs automate their finance and sales operations by integrating disparate business systems. By automating these tasks we save our customers time, give them confidence in their data, and provide insights that were previously not possible. Both the business and team are fast growing. Now is a very interesting time to join us.
   

  

**How do we do this:**
 Using Python we integrate with 10\\+ Accounting, CRM, and payment platforms, we run asynchronous ELT tasks. Storing the data, normalizing the data so we can work with data from separate systems like they are the same, and build smart automations on top of this. These automations vary from NLP to extract dates from documents, using elastic search to match separate data sources together, or building time based schedules from multiple data sources. Since there are a lot of variables, edge cases, and complex domain knowledge, we heavily rely on automated testing.
   

  

**In this role you will:**
* Work closely with product \\& customer success to create solutions that actually solve the end users problems.
* Create and maintain new 3rd party integrations.
* Create and maintain new automations on top of the imported data.
* Make POCs/MVPs for potential new features.
* Support DevOps efforts.
* Improve the Quality, Scalability, Security, and Reliability of the BE as a whole.


**Who We''''re Looking For**
 We''''re looking for someone with at least:
   

  

* 5\\+ years of BE development experience.
* 2\\+ years of Python experience.
* 2\\+ years of Relational Database experience.


**Additional experience in the following are a plus:**
 Django, Celery, Postgres, Docker, Terraform, AWS, Integrating 3rd party APIs, building APIs, Unit \\& Integration testing.
   

  

**We''''re Looking For Someone Who Has An End\\-to\\-end Mindset.**
* You can take ownership of a task, propose a solution and plan, involve the right parties, ask the right questions, and can deliver independently if necessary.
* Preferably you''''re someone that understands no one person knows everything, and is willing to learn, but also explain and teach others.
* Experience in a startup is a big plus, you enjoy working in a team with rapid iteration


**How to apply for this opportunity?**
* Step 1: Click On Apply! And Register or Login on our portal.
* Step 2: Complete the Screening Form \\& Upload updated Resume
* Step 3: Increase your chances to get shortlisted \\& meet the client for the Interview!

**What do you need for this opportunity?
   

  

**Must have skills required:**
 C\\# and Object Oriented Programming, PLAYFAB, Meta quest Developmen, Photon Pun, Unity 3D (VR Experience)
   

  

**Enver is Looking for:******
**Role : Senior Unity Developer**
**About Us:** 
 Enver Studio is a leading VR game development. We are passionate about pushing the boundaries of what’s possible in virtual reality and crafting unforgettable gaming adventures.
   

  

**Position Overview:** 
 We are seeking a Senior Unity Developer who is scrappy, quick to learn, and driven by a passion for developing cutting\\-edge games. The ideal candidate will thrive in a fast\\-paced environment, demonstrate strong problem\\-solving skills, and have experience with both multiplayer games and VR development. If you're excited about working hard and building the most popular applications in VR, we want to hear from you!
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Develop and implement complex gameplay systems and mechanics in Unity.
* Design and optimize multiplayer game systems using Photon PUN.
* Develop systems to work with Backend Player Data Service PLAYFAB
* Work with VR technologies, specifically Oculus Quest 2 and Unity XR Toolkit, to create immersive experiences.
* Collaborate effectively with designers, artists, and other developers in a team environment.
* Utilize version control systems (GitHub) for source code management.
* Understand and contribute to the entire pipeline from 3D asset integration to final development.


**Requirements:**
* Proven experience with multiplayer game development using Photon PUN. \\- REQUIREMENT
* Hands\\-on experience with VR development, particularly with Oculus Quest 2 and Unity XR Toolkit. If you lack specific VR experience, you must be an exceptionally strong developer with a willingness to quickly master VR concepts \\- REQUIREMENT
* Experience with PLAYFAB. \\- NOT REQUIRED BUT IDEAL
* Strong understanding of Unity's core systems and APIs.
* Experience in developing and implementing complex systems and gameplay mechanics.
* Deep understanding of C\\# and Object Oriented Programming
* Ability to quickly adapt, learn, and solve problems effectively.
* Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively in a team setting with designers, artists, and other developers.
* Proficiency with version control systems, specifically GitHub.
* Understanding of the full development pipeline, from 3D asset creation to game development.


 ﻿
   

  

**What We Offer:**
* Competitive salary with bonus opportunities based on performance
* The opportunity to work on leading VR projects with a talented team.
* Flexible working hours
* Remote work.

title: Senior Unity Developer
description:
**Experience** 
 : 5\\.00 \\+ years
   

  

**Salary** 
 : USD 1851\\-2962 / month (based on experience)
   

  

**Expected Notice Period** 
 : 15 Days
   

  

**Shift** 
 : (GMT\\-04:00\\) America/New\\_York (EDT)
   

  

**Opportunity Type** 
 : Remote
   

  

**Placement Type** 
 : Full Time Contract for 3 Months(40 hrs a week/160 hrs a month)
   

  

**(\\*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' client \\- Enver)
   

  

**What do you need for this opportunity?
   

  

**Must have skills required:**
 C\\# and Object Oriented Programming, PLAYFAB, Meta quest Developmen, Photon Pun, Unity 3D (VR Experience)
   

  

**Enver is Looking for:******
**Role : Senior Unity Developer**
**About Us:** 
 Enver Studio is a leading VR game development. We are passionate about pushing the boundaries of what’s possible in virtual reality and crafting unforgettable gaming adventures.
   

  

**Position Overview:** 
 We are seeking a Senior Unity Developer who is scrappy, quick to learn, and driven by a passion for developing cutting\\-edge games. The ideal candidate will thrive in a fast\\-paced environment, demonstrate strong problem\\-solving skills, and have experience with both multiplayer games and VR development. If you're excited about working hard and building the most popular applications in VR, we want to hear from you!
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Develop and implement complex gameplay systems and mechanics in Unity.
* Design and optimize multiplayer game systems using Photon PUN.
* Develop systems to work with Backend Player Data Service PLAYFAB
* Work with VR technologies, specifically Oculus Quest 2 and Unity XR Toolkit, to create immersive experiences.
* Collaborate effectively with designers, artists, and other developers in a team environment.
* Utilize version control systems (GitHub) for source code management.
* Understand and contribute to the entire pipeline from 3D asset integration to final development.


**Requirements:**
* Proven experience with multiplayer game development using Photon PUN. \\- REQUIREMENT
* Hands\\-on experience with VR development, particularly with Oculus Quest 2 and Unity XR Toolkit. If you lack specific VR experience, you must be an exceptionally strong developer with a willingness to quickly master VR concepts \\- REQUIREMENT
* Experience with PLAYFAB. \\- NOT REQUIRED BUT IDEAL
* Strong understanding of Unity's core systems and APIs.
* Experience in developing and implementing complex systems and gameplay mechanics.
* Deep understanding of C\\# and Object Oriented Programming
* Ability to quickly adapt, learn, and solve problems effectively.
* Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively in a team setting with designers, artists, and other developers.
* Proficiency with version control systems, specifically GitHub.
* Understanding of the full development pipeline, from 3D asset creation to game development.


 ﻿
   

  

**What We Offer:**
* Competitive salary with bonus opportunities based on performance
* The opportunity to work on leading VR projects with a talented team.
* Flexible working hours
* Remote work.


**Interview Rounds: 2**

title: Senior Backend Developer
description:
**Experience** 
 : 5\\.00 \\+ years
   

  

**Salary** 
 : Confidential (based on experience)
   

  

**Expected Notice Period** 
 : 15 Days
   

  

**Shift** 
 : (GMT\\+05:30\\) Asia/Kolkata (IST)
   

  

**Opportunity Type** 
 : Remote
   

  

**Placement Type** 
 : Full Time Permanent position(Payroll and Compliance to be managed by: A UK\\-based Finance Analytics Automation Platform)
   

  

**(\\*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' client \\- A UK\\-based Finance Analytics Automation Platform)
   

  

**What do you need for this opportunity?
   

  

**Must have skills required:**
 2\\+ years of Relational Database experience., 2\\+ years of Python experience., 5\\+ years of BE development experience.
   

  

**A UK\\-based Finance Analytics Automation Platform is Looking for:******
**Job Description**
**About:**
 The company is a smart finance automation platform. We help SMEs automate their finance and sales operations by integrating disparate business systems. By automating these tasks we save our customers time, give them confidence in their data, and provide insights that were previously not possible. Both the business and team are fast growing. Now is a very interesting time to join us.
   

  

**How do we do this:**
 Using Python we integrate with 10\\+ Accounting, CRM, and payment platforms, we run asynchronous ELT tasks. Storing the data, normalizing the data so we can work with data from separate systems like they are the same, and build smart automations on top of this. These automations vary from NLP to extract dates from documents, using elastic search to match separate data sources together, or building time based schedules from multiple data sources. Since there are a lot of variables, edge cases, and complex domain knowledge, we heavily rely on automated testing.
   

  

**In this role you will:**
* Work closely with product \\& customer success to create solutions that actually solve the end users problems.
* Create and maintain new 3rd party integrations.
* Create and maintain new automations on top of the imported data.
* Make POCs/MVPs for potential new features.
* Support DevOps efforts.
* Improve the Quality, Scalability, Security, and Reliability of the BE as a whole.


**Who We''''re Looking For**
 We''''re looking for someone with at least:
   

  

* 5\\+ years of BE development experience.
* 2\\+ years of Python experience.
* 2\\+ years of Relational Database experience.


**Additional experience in the following are a plus:**
 Django, Celery, Postgres, Docker, Terraform, AWS, Integrating 3rd party APIs, building APIs, Unit \\& Integration testing.
   

  

**We''''re Looking For Someone Who Has An End\\-to\\-end Mindset.**
* You can take ownership of a task, propose a solution and plan, involve the right parties, ask the right questions, and can deliver independently if necessary.
* Preferably you''''re someone that understands no one person knows everything, and is willing to learn, but also explain and teach others.
* Experience in a startup is a big plus, you enjoy working in a team with rapid iteration


**How to apply for this opportunity?**
* Step 1: Click On Apply! And Register or Login on our portal.
* Step 2: Complete the Screening Form \\& Upload updated Resume
* Step 3: Increase your chances to get shortlisted \\& meet the client for the Interview!


**About Uplers:**
